title: Very Useful
comment: Been using for a year or so. Got a few quirks but after learn those very useful.

title: Best Todoist Android App
comment: Minimalist design and features make this better than new Todoist officialbapp.

title: The best
comment: This is much better than the official todoist app. Highly recommended.

title: Great
comment: This is the best todoist app. Tried the others and this one is the best. Good features. Please create a widget similar to gtasks

title: Does not sync with Todoist
comment: Tasks do not show up in Todoist on other devices.

title: No Google Account Support?
comment: ToDoist is great using Chrome. Don't know why they don't have their own Android app, but you would think others who do would include Google Account support for people like me who used it to create a log in.
Useless

title: Good App
comment: Good App, integrates well, just missing the widget.

title: Simple but effective
comment: Simple but effective. I tested a lot, for me th best app available for todoist.  Very helpful is the option to setup your own query.

title: Probably works, but no Google log in
comment: From the other reviews, the app looks great, smooth and easy to use in tandem with the browser based version. Although my problem was that I could not even log in because my Todoist account is linked with my Google one and it does not allow that yet. Wish I could use it but not quite yet.

title: Better than the official app.
comment: It has a few bugs like with recurring tasks that get stuck or checked tasks unchecking by themselves, but it works much better than the official app.

title: No preview
comment: Have to register before I see anything, interface is so minimal that i can't be bothered.

title: Best app yet for todoist
comment: Simple and nice gui .

title: Room for small improvement but great!
comment: Little buggy but seems to be constantly improving with each update. Still by far the best Todoist app available!

title: Needs some work; not as good as typing todoist into browser
comment: This app is almost there, and I appreciate their efforts. With a few more updates,  I think it will be stellar. Issues right now include: The changes you make don't sync right away.  The shortcuts that todoist provides don't really work such as dates.  For some reason, I can't find a way to just bring up today's tasks (please correct me if I'm wrong)  Update 8/8: excellent updates and looks awesome on Samsung galaxy s3

title: currently best Todoist app out there
comment: Great app, works well overall - much better than the one from Todoist!  There are a couple bugs still, but not enough to make me give up on the app now, though.  The two that bother me most are 1) sync - changes don't sync automatically, or even within the set amount of time (i.e., 30 minutes after making a change on my phone and it isn't showing on the Todoist web site, even though I have Budoist set to sync every 5 minutes) and it doesn't sync on start/exit even though I have it set to do so; and 2) date/time - when I enter a deadline with a time it never shows up correctly - if I set something for noon on 7/30, it shows up as (example) 11:30 PM on 8/3 on my phone, and maybe 3:00 AM on 7/30/2013 on the website.  Then I edit the event on my phone, re-entering the correct date/time (which are showing correctly in the editing box, just not after the edits are submitted) and I'll end up with the event showing on my phone & the website at two different, but equally bizarre and incorrect, times.  I've gotten in the habit of just writing out the full date/time in the text of the task, but that's not really a useful work-around long term.

title: Very good work
comment: Very good work. When I have no sub projects I still have the arrow space holder empty and taking space affecting the good look oh GUI. Also the synching process takes long time. But it the best todoist client in my opinion

title: Great app
comment: Very clean, easy to use, full features. Thanks!
Simple and efficient

title: Excellent - but Widget needed please
comment: Great looking & does what it says really well....but needs a Widget please.

title: Best todoist client for android
comment: Little more to say, simple and powerful, like todoist itself. Really good support and response from the developer.

title: Very Good
comment: Works fine.  Very clean and tight.  No issue here.

title: Sweet!
comment: Best Todoist app. Tried all the rest, been using Todoist Pro, but this one is even better. Change the icon though.

title: Best of free todoist apps so far
comment: I tried TodoToday, Todoist by lightful, & Todoist for Android before this one. This has most complete functionality. I hope I find no bugs.

title: This is the one
comment: Tried last (because i didnt like the app icon :-)), but budoist killed it! Free, fully functional (labels, query, priority, etc), and no ads, yes please and thank you!

title: Best app
comment: The best app for Todoist, and free!

title: Best android app for todoist
comment: Best application I have tried for todoist. Works equally well on my HTC Flyer and Desire HD.

title: Getting there
comment: Clearly the best of the apps for todoist. What I would like to see is the free text search query (q: text)

title: force closes
comment: cant use it

title: Best Todoist app yet
comment: All they key features of the Todoist website, with the same elegant simplicity.  Very good.  A widget and a few minor tweaks would make it perfect.
Best todoist app
Simply and intuitive, inline  with Todoist design

title: Best todoist client.
comment: Simple but effective and pretty enough not to turn you off (unlike others).
Best of the Todoist apps, thanks.

title: Great Todoist app
comment: I'm loving this app so far. The only issue I have with it is that the view doesn't change after it's synced. If I'm in a project view and the sync runs, the project view isn't updated. I have to go back to the main project tree and back into my view. If that were fixed it would be a 5 out of 5.

title: Finally a decent Todoist app
comment: I have always loved the Todoist web site but have never found an acceptable Android app. This one, while not perfect, is the best one out there. Looking forward to further development and refinements. Highly recommended.

title: long awaited functionality!!!
comment: please add priority sorting after date - sory first by date and by priority within dates

title: Great app
comment: Well-done and usually updated app. GJ! :)

title: No go on ics
comment: Echo what Vlad said.  Can't add item on ics.  Make add item on top not through menu.
Yes!

title: Unwell on ICS
comment: At least for me, it crashes when I try to add a new item. Also, I would think that the command to add new item should not be hidden inside menu, but rather be in the top bar.  And it would be great if icons in the menu were not gray, given that menu background is slightly different shade of gray. Maybe, this was not tested on ICS? Haven't found a way to reorder items.

title: * non completable tasks
comment: The * tasks are not completable on todoist, you should have that in future developement. Best todoist client app for android.

title: Todoist Junkie
comment: I have relied on Todoist for years, now, and have been searching for an Android client for about a year.  All seem to fall short one way or another.  My initial impression of this app is good; I've got to play some more.
